name: HowSpiritualAreYouQuiz
0:
”Alexa, open spiritual quiz”
”Alexa, start spiritual quiz”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spiritual quiz
des:
Welcome to the Spirit Checkup, this is one of a series of three quizzes to help you do a checkup on how in-tune you are with your mind, body, and spirit.  We highly encourage answering these questions truthfully, no one sees the results but you, unless you want to share them via social media.  Our comprehensive quizzes and our wholeness coaches can help you tune up your body, mind, and spirit health.  We highly suggest revisiting this quiz at least once a quarter for check-ins and reminders to do your mind, body, and spirit good!

Many times, when people think of anything related to spirituality, their thoughts immediately move to external things like churches, mosques, temples, images of gods, ancient texts, and more. They think of prayer, meditation, rituals, giving, worshiping, and other activities. Rarely do people tend to think of themselves as a spiritual being.  There is a lot of doing and things, but not very much being.  What do I mean by being?  Being peaceful, being loving, being happy, being joyful, being wise, being authentic, being your true self, being truthful, and more all embody what it means to be spiritual.

Take our quiz and if you would like, contact us and one of our wholeness coaches will help you with tips on how to lead a more mindful life.  Your answers will range from always, sometimes, and rarely, always should be chosen if it represents what you would do at least 90% of the time, sometimes if it represents what you would do at least 50 to 60% of the time, and rarely if it represents what you are least likely to do on any given question.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
